Sentencas: A two-dimensional (2D) model is developed to analyze the performance and efficiency of H2O/CO2 co-electrolysis in tubular SOEC (solid oxide electrolysis cell).
Titulo: Comprehensive modeling of tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell for co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide

Sentencas: The model fully considers the fluid flow, heat/mass transfer and electrochemical/chemical reactions in the SOEC.
Titulo: Comprehensive modeling of tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell for co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide

Sentencas: The results show that RWGSR (reversed water-gas shift reaction) significantly promotes CO2 conversion ratio.
Titulo: Comprehensive modeling of tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell for co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide

Sentencas: The effect of important operating parameters was comprehensively studied and optimal operating condition was determined.
Titulo: Comprehensive modeling of tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell for co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide

Sentencas: When the inlet gas flows in parallel flow mode with the velocity of 1 m s(-1), TSOEC with the H2O/CO2 molar ratio of 1 at 700 degrees C at 1.4 V achieves the highest efficiency of 59.4% and the syngas conversion ratio of 43.8%.
Titulo: Comprehensive modeling of tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell for co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide

Sentencas: Lowering gas flow velocity decreases the syngas yield but promotes H2O/CO2 convert ratio and efficiency.
Titulo: Comprehensive modeling of tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell for co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide

Sentencas: Finally, calculation found that counter flow is superior to parallel flow.
Titulo: Comprehensive modeling of tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell for co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide
